citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
A female pug #127 had a left eye that contained a moderate amount of yellow discharge, discolored white portion of the
eye, and a dry surface of the eye globe. This condition was not identified by the licensee, therefore care had not been
initiated or communicated with the attending veterinarian on the findings. Failure to promptly identify such conditions
delays care and may result in undue discomfort. A more rigorous method of daily observation of all animals must be
implemented in order to property assess their health and well-being. Correct by communicating with the attending
veterinarian regarding the findings of today’s inspection.
Correct by 12/7/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
Additional Inspectors:
KEVIN WILKEN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR n

narrative:
2.40(b)(3) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
A female pug #127 had a left eye that contained a moderate amount of yellow discharge, discolored white portion of the 
eye, and a dry surface of the eye globe. This condition was not identified by the licensee, therefore care had not been 
initiated or communicated with the attending veterinarian on the findings. Failure to promptly identify such conditions 
delays care and may result in undue discomfort. A more rigorous method of daily observation of all animals must be 
implemented in order to property assess their health and well-being. Correct by communicating with the attending 
veterinarian regarding the findings of today’s inspection.  
Correct by 12/7/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee. 
 
Additional Inspectors: 
KEVIN WILKEN, ANIMAL CARE INSPECTOR n
